participant_1.background:
I enjoy rock music when I'm cooking dinner or driving my Mustang.
i ride horses.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
I have a baby monitor that I use to watch my baby while I play video games.
I like to pamper myself.

participant_2.background:
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
my hair is very long.
I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.
i love hiking and staying fit.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Great! Thanks for asking, how about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I love to spend time with my family and friends, go hiking, and stay fit. What about you?
I like to ride horses, pamper myself, and listen to rock music.
That sounds really relaxing! I've never ridden a horse before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's so much fun! I love being out in nature and being surrounded by horses.
I can imagine! It sounds like you have a lot of fun on the weekends.
I do! I try to make the most of my time off.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your weekends.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a hairstylist. I get to be creative everyday and I love that my family is so supportive of my career.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at your job.
Thanks! I try my best!
What's your favorite thing about being a hairstylist?
I love getting to know my clients and helping them to feel their best.
That's really nice of you! I'm sure your clients appreciate that.
I hope so! I love making people happy.
That's awesome! You seem like a really great person.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it's been nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day.
You too! It was nice talking to you
